text:
In #India, #Muslims are not receiving rations because they are #COVID19 scapegoats. Gov’t stores refuse to help impoverished Muslim families. This is what #Modi’s #Hindutva reign reaps: the marginalization of 200M Muslims. Complete #ModiMadness. 
 https://t.co/skWhybPJR0
